ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Estimate generalized additive mixed models via a version of function gamm() from 'mgcv', using 'lme4' for estimation.
Estimate generalized additive mixed models via a version of function gamm() from 'mgcv', using 'lme4' for estimation.

name: r-gamm4
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gamm4
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gamm4_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gamm4/gamm4_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bacc343c19395f54e45f2a5344a2ee2dd2d8e8ce022eaf2b5eff6ea1e4acaedf

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.7_0
    - r-lme4 >=1.0
    - r-mgcv >=1.9_2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.7_0
    - r-lme4 >=1.0
    - r-mgcv >=1.9_2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gamm4')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gamm4')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gamm4
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Estimate generalized additive mixed models via a version of function gamm() from 'mgcv', using 'lme4' for estimation.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: gamm4
# Version: 0.2-5
# Author: Simon Wood, Fabian Scheipl
# Maintainer: Simon Wood <simon.wood@r-project.org>
# Title: Generalized Additive Mixed Models using 'mgcv' and 'lme4'
# Description: Estimate generalized additive mixed models via a version of function gamm() from 'mgcv', using 'lme4' for estimation.
# Depends: R (>= 2.9.0), methods, Matrix, lme4 (>= 0.999375-31), mgcv (>= 1.7-23)
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-07-25 11:18:42 UTC; sw283
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-07-25 21:57:31 UTC
